snippet: The NYTimes.com redesign is more than a fresh coat of paint — in addition to the new look, our article pages also rely on a new framework and codebase to run faster while making future changes easier.
abstract: The NYTimes.com redesign is more than a fresh coat of paint — in addition to the new look, our article pages also rely on a new framework and codebase to run faster while making future changes easier.

headline.main: The Technology Behind the NYTimes.com Redesign
